title: a.c. system
fullText:
Where an earthed system is used, plug and socket-outlets of the earthing type shall be arranged with a terminal provided for the protective conductor in accordance with AS/NZS 3123, AS/NZS 3112 and IEC 60309-2.
Where socket-outlets are supplied at different voltages, the socket-outlets and plugs shall be designed in such a way that an incorrect connection cannot be made.
